page.title: 06SOCIAL LIFE & ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
The social life of Ashby Magna centres around the village hall which was purchased from the Church Commissioners in l978 by the villagers, and the Chequers Public House.
The village hall is used by all ages, including the mother and baby group, play school, youth groups, keep fit classes, Women's Institute, Gardening Association and the Ancient Order of Forresters.
The Chequers Public House is a free house catering for villagers and out of town visitors alike. In congenial surroundings it provides a wide range of beverages and food in a traditional 'Country Inn' atmosphere.
